contents.zh-CHS: 指向U的实例的路径。。。FULLDATA-TLV值（a）FULLDATA-TLV值（b）值（c）

contents.text: Note: The variable-length field requires the addition of a FULLDATA-TLV within the outer FULLDATA-TLV as in the case of component b above.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：可变长度字段要求在外部FULLDATA-TLV中添加FULLDATA-TLV，与上述组件b的情况相同。

contents.text: Structure containing an array of another structure type.
contents.zh-CHS: 结构包含另一种结构类型的数组。

contents.text: (a) Encoding using SPARSEDATA-TLV, with two instances of z[], also described with SPARSEDATA-TLV, assuming only the 10th and 15th subscripts of z[] are encoded.
contents.zh-CHS: (a) 使用SPARSTAT-TLV进行编码，z[]有两个实例，也使用SPARSTAT-TLV进行描述，假设仅对z[]的第10和第15个下标进行编码。

contents.text:
path to instance of V ...
SPARSEDATA-TLV
 ComponentIDof(x), lengthof(x), valueof(x)
 ComponentIDof(y), lengthof(y), valueof(y)
 ComponentIDof(z), lengthof(all below)
   ComponentID = 10 (i.e index 10 from z[]), lengthof(all below)
       ComponentIDof(a), lengthof(a), valueof(a)
       ComponentIDof(b), lengthof(b), valueof(b)
   ComponentID = 15 (index 15 from z[]), lengthof(all below)
       ComponentIDof(a), lengthof(a), valueof(a)
       ComponentIDof(c), lengthof(c), valueof(c)
Note the holes in the components of z (10 followed by 15). Also note the gap in index 15 with only components a and c appearing but not b.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意z组件中的孔（10后接15）。还要注意索引15中的间隙，其中仅出现组件a和c，而未出现组件b。

contents.text: Appendix D. Use Cases
contents.zh-CHS: 附录D.用例

contents.text: Assume LFB with the following components for the following use cases.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于以下用例，假设LFB具有以下组件。

contents.text: foo1, type u32, ID = 1
contents.zh-CHS: foo1，类型u32，ID=1

contents.text: foo2, type u32, ID = 2
contents.zh-CHS: foo2，类型u32，ID=2

contents.text:
table1: type array, ID = 3
        components are:
        t1, type u32, ID = 1
        t2, type u32, ID = 2  // index into table2
        KEY: nhkey, ID = 1, V = t2

table2: type array, ID = 4
        components are:
        j1, type u32, ID = 1
        j2, type u32, ID = 2
        KEY: akey, ID = 1, V = { j1,j2 }
table3: type array, ID = 5 components are: someid, type u32, ID = 1 name, type string variable sized, ID = 2
contents.zh-CHS: 表3：类型数组，ID=5组件是：someid，类型u32，ID=1名称，类型字符串变量大小，ID=2

contents.text:
table4: type array, ID = 6
        components are:
        j1, type u32, ID = 1
        j2, type u32, ID = 2
        j3, type u32, ID = 3
        j4, type u32, ID = 4
        KEY: mykey, ID = 1, V = { j1}
table5: type array, ID = 7 components are: p1, type u32, ID = 1 p2, type array, ID = 2, array components of type-X
contents.zh-CHS: 表5：类型数组，ID=7组件为：p1，类型u32，ID=1 p2，类型数组，ID=2，类型X的数组组件

contents.text:
Type-X:
        x1, ID 1, type u32
        x2, ID2 , type u32
                KEY: tkey, ID = 1, V = { x1}
All examples will use valueof(x) to indicate the value of the referenced component x. In the case where F_SEL** are missing (bits equal to 00) then the flags will not show any selection.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有示例都将使用valueof（x）来表示参考组件x的值。如果F_SEL**缺失（位等于00），则标志将不显示任何选择。

contents.text: All the examples only show use of FULLDATA-TLV for data encoding; although SPARSEDATA-TLV would make more sense in certain occasions, the emphasis is on showing the message layout. Refer to Appendix C for examples that show usage of both FULLDATA-TLV and SPARSEDATA-TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有示例仅显示FULLDATA-TLV用于数据编码；虽然A-TLV在某些场合更有意义，但重点是显示消息布局。有关FULLDATA-TLV和SPARA-TLV的使用示例，请参阅附录C。

contents.text: 1. To get foo1
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 获得食物

contents.text:
OPER = GET-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV: IDCount = 1, IDs = 1
Result:
OPER = GET-RESPONSE-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV:
                flags=0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 1
                FULLDATA-TLV L = 4+4, V =  valueof(foo1)
2. To set foo2 to 10
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 将foo2设置为10

contents.text:
OPER = SET-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV:
                flags = 0,  IDCount = 1, IDs = 2
                FULLDATA-TLV: L = 4+4, V=10
Result: OPER = SET-RESPONSE-TLV PATH-DATA-TLV: flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 2 RESULT-TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 结果：OPER=SET-RESPONSE-TLV PATH-DATA-TLV:flags=0，IDCount=1，IDs=2结果-TLV

contents.text: 3. To dump table2
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 转储表2

contents.text:
OPER = GET-TLV
     PATH-DATA-TLV:
             IDCount = 1, IDs = 4
Result:
OPER = GET-RESPONSE-TLV
     PATH-DATA-TLV:
             flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 4
             FULLDATA-TLV: L = XXX, V=
                  a series of: index, valueof(j1), valueof(j2)
                  representing the entire table

Note: One should be able to take a GET-RESPONSE-TLV and convert it to a SET-TLV. If the result in the above example is sent back in a SET-TLV (instead of a GET-RESPONSE_TLV), then the entire contents of the table will be replaced at that point.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：应该能够获取GET-RESPONSE-TLV并将其转换为SET-TLV。如果上述示例中的结果以SET-TLV（而不是GET-RESPONSE_TLV）的形式发送回，则此时将替换表的全部内容。

contents.text: 4. Multiple operations example. To create entry 0-5 of table2 (Error conditions are ignored)
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 多操作示例。创建表2的条目0-5（忽略错误条件）

contents.text:
OPER = SET-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV:
                flags = 0 , IDCount = 1, IDs = 4
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                  flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 0
                  FULLDATA-TLV valueof(j1), valueof(j2) of entry 0
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                  flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 1
                  FULLDATA-TLV valueof(j1), valueof(j2) of entry 1
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                  flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 2
                  FULLDATA-TLV valueof(j1), valueof(j2) of entry 2
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                  flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 3
                  FULLDATA-TLV valueof(j1), valueof(j2) of entry 3
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                  flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 4
                  FULLDATA-TLV valueof(j1), valueof(j2) of entry 4
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                  flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 5
                  FULLDATA-TLV valueof(j1), valueof(j2) of entry 5

Result:
OPER = SET-RESPONSE-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV:
                flags = 0 , IDCount = 1, IDs = 4
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                    flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 0
                    RESULT-TLV
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                    flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 1
                    RESULT-TLV
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                    flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 2
                    RESULT-TLV
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                    flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 3
                    RESULT-TLV
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                    flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 4
                    RESULT-TLV
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                    flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs = 5
                    RESULT-TLV
5. Block operations (with holes) example. Replace entry 0,2 of table2.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 块操作（带孔）示例。替换表2的条目0,2。

contents.text:
OPER = SET-TLV

contents.text: 13. Multiple atomic operations.
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 多重原子操作。

contents.text: Note 1: This emulates adding a new nexthop entry and then atomically updating the L3 entries pointing to an old NH to point to a new one. The assumption is that both tables are in the same LFB.
contents.zh-CHS: 注1：这模拟添加一个新的nexthop条目，然后自动更新指向旧NH的L3条目以指向新条目。假设两个表位于同一LFB中。

contents.text: Note: Observe the two operations on the LFB instance; both are SET operations.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：观察LFB实例上的两个操作；两者都是集合操作。

contents.text:
//Operation 1: Add a new entry to table2 index #20.
OPER = SET-TLV
        Path-TLV:
                flags = 0, IDCount = 2,  IDs = 4.20
                FULLDATA-TLV, V= valueof(j1),valueof(j2)

// Operation 2: Update table1 entry which
// was pointing with t2 = 10 to now point to 20
OPER = SET-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV:
                flags = F_SELKEY, IDCount = 1, IDs = 3
                KEYINFO-TLV = KeyID=1 KEY_DATA=10
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                        flags = 0  IDCount = 1, IDs = 2
                        FULLDATA-TLV, V= 20

Result:
//first operation, SET
OPER = SET-RESPONSE-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV
                flags = 0 IDCount = 3, IDs = 4.20
                RESULT-TLV code = success
                        FULLDATA-TLV, V = valueof(j1),valueof(j2)
// second operation SET - assuming entry 16 was updated
OPER = SET-RESPONSE-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV
                flags = 0 IDCount = 2, IDs = 3.16
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                        flags = 0  IDCount = 1, IDs = 2
                        RESULT-TLV code = success
                                FULLDATA-TLV, Length = XXXX v=20

17. Further example of manipulating a table of tables
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 操作一个表的表的进一步示例

contents.text: Consider table6, which is defined as: table6: type array, ID = 8 components are: p1, type u32, ID = 1 p2, type array, ID = 2, array components of type type-A
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑表6，它定义为：表6：类型数组，ID＝8个组件是：p1、类型u32、id＝1 p2、类型数组、id＝2、类型A的数组组件。

contents.text: type-A: a1, type u32, ID 1, a2, type array ID2 ,array components of type type-B
contents.zh-CHS: A型：a1型、u32型、ID 1、a2型、阵列ID2型、B型阵列组件

contents.text: type-B: b1, type u32, ID 1 b2, type u32, ID 2
contents.zh-CHS: B型：b1型，u32型，ID 1 b2型，u32型，ID 2

contents.text: If for example one wanted to set by replacing: table6.10.p1 to 111 table6.10.p2.20.a1 to 222 table6.10.p2.20.a2.30.b1 to 333
in one message and one operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 在一个消息和一个操作中。

contents.text: There are two ways to do this: a) using nesting b) using a flat path data
contents.zh-CHS: 有两种方法可以做到这一点：a）使用嵌套b）使用平面路径数据

contents.text: A. Method using nesting in one message with a single operation
contents.zh-CHS: A.通过一次操作在一条消息中使用嵌套的方法

contents.text:
operation = SET-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV
                flags = 0  IDCount = 2, IDs=6.10
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                        flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs=1
                        FULLDATA-TLV: L=XXXX,
                                V = {111}
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                        flags = 0  IDCount = 2, IDs=2.20
                        PATH-DATA-TLV
                                flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs=1
                                FULLDATA-TLV: L=XXXX,
                                        V = {222}
                        PATH-DATA-TLV :
                                flags = 0, IDCount = 3, IDs=2.30.1
                                FULLDATA-TLV: L=XXXX,
                                        V = {333}

Result:
operation = SET-RESPONSE-TLV
        PATH-DATA-TLV
                flags = 0  IDCount = 2, IDs=6.10
                PATH-DATA-TLV
                        flags = 0, IDCount = 1, IDs=1
                        RESULT-TLV
                PATH-DATA-TLV

18. Get a whole LFB (all its components, etc.).

contents.text: For example: At startup a CE might well want the entire FE Object LFB. So, in a request targeted at class 1, instance 1, one might find:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如：在启动时，CE可能需要整个FE对象LFB。因此，在针对类1实例1的请求中，您可能会发现：

contents.text: operation = GET-TLV PATH-DATA-TLV flags = 0 IDCount = 0

contents.text: result: operation = GET-RESPONSE-TLV PATH-DATA-TLV flags = 0 IDCount = 0 FULLDATA-TLV encoding of the FE Object LFB
